review: Its quiite good if u want a racing game because its free  but its really hard  to stear with arrow keys i think it would be alot easier with a joystick

Very good free to play. Good Co-op, Pretty good Versus, but needs bigger maps on team deathmatch. Rental Weapons not Permeant (some are)? But it is in Beta so they might mak more maps, bigger maps.Rating: 9/10
Old, out dated, not worth $20. More like a $1 game.
